entry.title: The Confessions of Marcus Hutchins, the Hacker Who Saved the Internet
entry.quote: At 22, he single-handedly put a stop to the worst cyberattack the world had ever seen. Then he was arrested by the FBI. This is his untold story.

entry.title: Our weird behavior during the pandemic is messing with AI models
entry.quote: Machine-learning models trained on normal behavior are showing cracks —forcing humans to step in to set them straight.

entry.title: Ethical Recommendations for COVID-19 Visualizations
entry.quote: The stakes are high, and the data is complex. A practical guide to doing no harm for data designers working on COVID-19 visualizations

entry.title: WebAssembly COBOL Pong
entry.quote: Pong written in COBOL, compiled to WebAssembly.

entry.title: Nvidia launches Clara Guardian to power smart hospitals with surveillance, sensors, and edge AI
entry.quote: Nvidia insists smart hospitals can ensure cleaner environments and reduce the risk of spreading infectious diseases, including COVID-19. “If we can employ technologies like video and voice and use artificial intelligence to have a real-time active engagement to create actions and efficiencies for nurses, that’s a huge gain for health care professionals,
